title: VSCodium
content:
Location:
```
gedit ~/.config/VSCodium/User/settings.json
```

Data:
```
{

    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "files.exclude": {
        "dist": true,
        ".editorconfig": true,
        ".gitignore": true,
        ".update_backup": true,
        "hooks": true,
        "jsconfig.json": true,
        "LICENSE": true,
        "node_modules": true,
        "package-lock.json": true,
        "platforms": true,
        "webpack.config.js": true,
        "README.md": true,
        "babel.config.js": true,
    },
    "terminal.external.linuxExec": "x-terminal-emulator",
    "terminal.integrated.shell.linux": "bash",
    "terminal.integrated.shellArgs.linux": [ "-l" ],
    "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
    "workbench.startupEditor": "newUntitledFile",
    "cSpell.enableFiletypes": [
        "vue"
    ],
    "cSpell.language": "en,de",
    "workbench.statusBar.visible": false,
    "window.menuBarVisibility": "toggle",
    "importCost.typescriptExtensions": [
        ".js",
        ".vue"
    ],
    "window.zoomLevel": 1,
    "better-comments.tags": [
        {
            "tag": "!",
            "color": "#FF2D00",
            "strikethrough": false,
            "underline": false,
            "backgroundColor": "transparent",
            "bold": false,
            "italic": false
        },
        {
            "tag": "?",
            "color": "#3498DB",
            "strikethrough": false,
            "underline": false,
            "backgroundColor": "transparent",
            "bold": false,
            "italic": false
        },
        {
            "tag": "//",
            "color": "#474747",
            "strikethrough": true,
            "underline": false,
            "backgroundColor": "transparent",
            "bold": false,
            "italic": false
        },
        {
            "tag": "todo",
            "color": "#FF8C00",
            "strikethrough": false,
            "underline": false,
            "backgroundColor": "transparent",
            "bold": false,
            "italic": false
        },
        {
            "tag": "..",
            "color": "#505153",
            "strikethrough": false,
            "underline": false,
            "backgroundColor": "transparent",
            "bold": false,
            "italic": false
        },
        {
            "tag": "--",
            "color": "#505153",
            "strikethrough": false,
            "underline": false,
            "backgroundColor": "#000",
            "bold": false,
            "italic": false
        },
        {
            "tag": "*",
            "color": "#98C379",
            "strikethrough": false,
            "underline": false,
            "backgroundColor": "transparent",
            "bold": false,
            "italic": false
        }
    ],
    "diffEditor.ignoreTrimWhitespace": false,
    "workbench.tree.indent": 40,
    "git.confirmSync": false,
    "editor.tabCompletion": "on",
    "scss.lint.validProperties": [
        "android-elevation",
        "horizontal-align",
        "text-wrap",
        "placeholder-color"
    ],
    "css.lint.validProperties": [
        "android-elevation",
        "horizontal-align",
        "text-wrap",
        "placeholder-color"
    ],
    "editor.minimap.maxColumn": 100,
    "editor.scrollBeyondLastColumn": 1,
    "editor.glyphMargin": false,
    "editor.lineNumbers": "interval",
    "workbench.activityBar.visible": true,
    "breadcrumbs.enabled": false,
    "editor.fontFamily": "'Font Awesome 5 Brands','Font Awesome 5 Free','cascadia code'",
    "editor.fontLigatures": true,
    "editor.cursorBlinking": "expand",
    "editor.cursorWidth": 2,
    "editor.fontSize": 16,
    "workbench.iconTheme": "material-icon-theme",
    "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
        "statusBar.background" : "#222121",
        "statusBar.noFolderBackground" : "#161515",
        "statusBar.debuggingBackground": "#141414",
        "scrollbarSlider.background":"#775f5750",
        "scrollbarSlider.activeBackground": "#0084ff57",
        "scrollbarSlider.hoverBackground": "#0e79d144"
    },
    "editor.tokenColorCustomizations": null,
    "editor.maxTokenizationLineLength":20000,
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Ayu Dark",
    "search.useIgnoreFiles": false,
    "editor.wordWrap": "bounded",
    "html.format.wrapLineLength": 92,
    "editor.wordWrapColumn": 92,
    "cSpell.userWords": [
        "fitored",
        "jquery",
        "mixins",
        "rgba",
        "store",
        "vuex"
    ],
    "editor.renderWhitespace": "trailing",
    "editor.codeLensFontFamily": "'cascadia code'",
    "editor.fontWeight": null,
}
```
